name: AvalonEdit
tagline: The WPF-based text editor component used in SharpDevelop
body:
### AvalonEdit
AvalonEdit is a WPF-based text editor component. It was written by @dgrunwald for the SharpDevelop IDE.
Version 5 of AvalonEdit is released under the MIT license.

![AvalonEdit Screenshot](http://www.codeproject.com/KB/edit/AvalonEdit/screenshot.png)

### Documentation

For introductory documentation, please take a look at the CodeProject article "[Using AvalonEdit](http://www.codeproject.com/KB/edit/AvalonEdit.aspx)"

The source code download of AvalonEdit contains sources for a help file (created with Sandcastle, if you don't like reading the XML sources). The compiled help file is available as download on the CodeProject article.

### Download
Pre-built AvalonEdit binaries are available in the `ICSharpCode.AvalonEdit` NuGet package. The package contains binaries for .NET 3.5 and .NET 4.x.

The source code is available on GitHub.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
